GSD.description:
mm/kmemleak: avoid scanning potential huge holes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.178 by commit d3533ee20e9a0e2e8f60384da7450d43d1c63d1a. For more details please see the references link.
